verses.text: \w This|strong="G3588"\w* \add is\add* a \w true|strong="G4103"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w desire|strong="G3713"\w* the office of a \w bishop|strong="G1984"\w*, he \w desireth|strong="G1937"\w* a \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*.

A \w bishop|strong="G1985"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w blameless|strong="G0423"\w*, the \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* of \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w vigilant|strong="G3524"\w*, \w sober|strong="G4998"\w*, of good \w behaviour|strong="G2887"\w*, given to \w hospitality|strong="G5382"\w*, apt to \w teach|strong="G1317"\w*;

\w Not|strong="G3361"\w* given to \w wine|strong="G3943"\w*, \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w striker|strong="G4131"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* greedy of filthy \w lucre|strong="G0146"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w patient|strong="G1933"\w*, not a \w brawler|strong="G0269"\w*, not \w covetous|strong="G0866"\w*;

One that \w ruleth|strong="G4291"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* his \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w subjection|strong="G5292"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w gravity|strong="G4587"\w*;

(\w For|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w how|strong="G1492"\w* to \w rule|strong="G4291"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w how|strong="G4459"\w* shall he take \w care|strong="G1959"\w* of the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*?)

\w Not|strong="G3361"\w* a \w novice|strong="G3504"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* being lifted up with \w pride|strong="G5187"\w* he \w fall|strong="G1706"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w condemnation|strong="G2917"\w* of the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* a \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w report|strong="G3141"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* them which are \w without|strong="G1855"\w*; \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* he \w fall|strong="G1706"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w reproach|strong="G3680"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w snare|strong="G3803"\w* of the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*.

\w Likewise|strong="G5615"\w* \add must\add* the \w deacons|strong="G1249"\w* \add be\add* \w grave|strong="G4586"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w doubletongued|strong="G1351"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* given \w to|strong="G4337"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* greedy of filthy \w lucre|strong="G0146"\w*;
\w Holding|strong="G2192"\w* the \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* of the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w pure|strong="G2513"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w let|strong="G1381"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w* be \w proved|strong="G1381"\w*; \w then|strong="G1534"\w* let them use the office of a \w deacon|strong="G1247"\w*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* \add found\add* \w blameless|strong="G0410"\w*.

Even \w so|strong="G5615"\w* \add must their\add* \w wives|strong="G1135"\w* \add be\add* \w grave|strong="G4586"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w slanderers|strong="G1228"\w*, \w sober|strong="G3524"\w*, \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G2077"\w* the \w deacons|strong="G1249"\w* \w be|strong="G2077"\w* the \w husbands|strong="G0435"\w* of \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w ruling|strong="G4291"\w* their \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* their \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w houses|strong="G3624"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* they that have used the office of a \w deacon|strong="G1247"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w* \w purchase|strong="G4046"\w* to \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* a \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w degree|strong="G0898"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w boldness|strong="G3954"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

These \w things|strong="G5023"\w* write \w I|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w hoping|strong="G1679"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w shortly|strong="G5032"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* I tarry \w long|strong="G1019"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* thou mayest \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* thou \w oughtest|strong="G1163"\w* to behave \w thyself|strong="G0390"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* of the \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, the \w pillar|strong="G4769"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ground|strong="G1477"\w* of the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* without \w controversy|strong="G3672"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* of \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*: \w God|strong="G2316"\w* was \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w seen|strong="G3700"\w* of \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, \w preached|strong="G2784"\w* \w unto|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, believed \w on|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, received \w up|strong="G0353"\w* \w into|strong="G1722"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.
